title: The Patsâ€™ Descent, the Shaky Steelers, and Week 14 Bets
description:
Sharp and House react to the Patriots getting blown out by the Rams (0:30) before recapping the results of Week 13 (7:30), analyzing the marquee Steelers-Bills matchup (27:30), and offering some betting advice for the rest of the Week 14 games (51:30).
Hosts: Warren Sharp and Joe House
